name: Social Feeds
description:
I started designing content for social media a few years ago at Kodinger.com. Until now, I'm still designing content, so some friends have been inspired to design it too. Not many of them could design, so I decided to make some ready-to-use templates. Of course, you can use the templates for free too!


Features:

- Free for personal and commercial use (no attribution required)

- 10+ different layouts

- Easy to use (duplicate, change color, write content, and export!)

- Local styles and components (make the design will have a consistent style)

- High-definition (1080 x 1080 in pixels)

- Design dimensions tested for social media (Facebook, Instagram & Twitter)


How to use:

  • Download this file
  • Open the file
  • Go to the Tempalates page
  • Duplicate or copy template you want to use
  • Start designing (change text, image, and everything)
  • Export


Thanks!
